Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,267 @@ +import { useState } from "react"; +import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; +import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card"; +import { Input } from "@/components/ui/input"; +import { Label } from "@/components/ui/label"; +import Layout from "@/components/Layout"; +import GoogleMapEmbed from "@/components/GoogleMapEmbed"; +import AttendanceTracker from "@/components/AttendanceTracker"; +import TestimonialsSection from "@/components/TestimonialsSection"; +import { MapPin, Clock, DollarSign, Users, Phone } from "lucide-react"; +import { useToast } from "@/hooks/use-toast"; + +const Football = () => { + const [attendeeName, setAttendeeName] = useState(""); + const { toast } = useToast(); + + const locations = [ + { + name: "Downtown Sports Complex", + address: "Beirut Central District, Lebanon", + schedule: "Monday & Wednesday: 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM", + attendees: 18, + maxCapacity: 20, + coordinates: "33.8959,35.4781" + }, + { + name: "North Side Football Field", + address: "Achrafieh District, Beirut, Lebanon", + schedule: "Tuesday & Thursday: 6:30 PM - 8:00 PM", + attendees: 14, + maxCapacity: 16, + coordinates: "33.9011,35.5087" + }, + { + name: "West End Sports Center", + address: "Hamra District, Beirut, Lebanon", + schedule: "Saturday: 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM", + attendees: 15, + maxCapacity: 18, + coordinates: "33.8971,35.4826" + } + ]; + + const packages = [ + { + name: "Single Session", + price: "$40", + sessions: 1, + description: "Perfect for trying out our program" + }, + { + name: "4 Sessions Package", + price: "$140", + sessions: 4, + description: "Great value for regular training", + popular: true + }, + { + name: "8 Sessions Package", + price: "$260", + sessions: 8, + description: "Best value for serious players" + }, + { + name: "Monthly Unlimited", + price: "$320", + sessions: "Unlimited", + description: "Train as much as you want" + } + ]; + + const handleAddToAttendance = (locationName: string) => { + if (!attendeeName.trim()) { + toast({ + title: "Name Required", + description: "Please enter your name to join the attendance list.", + variant: "destructive" + }); + return; + } + + // Simulate sending to WhatsApp (Lebanese number) + const whatsappNumber = "+9611234567"; // Lebanese WhatsApp number + const message = `New attendance registration:\nName: ${attendeeName}\nLocation: ${locationName}\nProgram: Football Training`; + const whatsappUrl = `https://wa.me/${whatsappNumber}?text=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`; + + window.open(whatsappUrl, '_blank'); + + toast({ + title: "Added to Attendance!", + description: `${attendeeName} has been added to ${locationName} attendance list.` + }); + + setAttendeeName(""); + }; + + return ( + + {/* Hero Section */} +
+
+

+ Football Training Program +

+

+ Professional football coaching for adults with flexible scheduling across three convenient locations. +

+
+
+ + {/* Locations Section */} +
+
+
+

+ Training Locations +

+

+ Choose the location that works best for you +

+
+ +
+ {locations.map((location, index) => ( +
+ + + + + {location.name} + + {location.address} + + + +
+ + {location.schedule} +
+ + + + + handleAddToAttendance(location.name)} + /> +
+ ))} +
+ + {/* Attendance Registration */} + + + Join Attendance List + + Enter your name to be added to the attendance list for your chosen location + + + +
+ + setAttendeeName(e.target.value)} + placeholder="Enter your full name" + /> +
+ + +
+
+ + {/* Packages Section */} +
+
+
+

+ Training Packages +

+

+ Flexible pricing options to suit your training goals +

+
+ +
+ {packages.map((pkg, index) => ( + + {pkg.popular && ( +
+ + Most Popular + +
+ )} + + {pkg.name} +
+ + {pkg.price.replace('$', '')} +
+ {pkg.sessions} sessions + + +

{pkg.description}

+ + + + ))} +
+
+
+ + {/* Testimonials Section */} + + + {/* Payment Methods */} +
+
+

Payment Methods

+
+ {["Cash", "OMT", "Pay", "Bank Audi"].map((method, index) => ( + + +

{method}

+ + + ))} +
+
+
